original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND v.BountyAmount>=0 AND v.BountyAmount<=300 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-29 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=18
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.BountyAmount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(votes.BountyAmount AS INTEGER) <= 300 AND votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-29 00:00:00'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 18
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E4E3.UserId)
